solution_line_template: Jackson deleted all his old emails so now he only has the new ones left, which he first gets {first_received_emails} + {second_received_emails} of = <<{first_received_emails}+{second_received_emails}={initial_new_emails}>>{initial_new_emails} emails.

Then Jackson receives {final_received_emails} more emails to add to the other {initial_new_emails} new ones, {final_received_emails} + {initial_new_emails} = <<{final_received_emails}+{initial_new_emails}={total_new_emails}>>{total_new_emails} new emails.
